tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE temperature_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_id INT NOT NULL,
    temperature_reading FLOAT NOT NULL,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id)
);
CREATE TABLE medications (    medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    medication_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,    storage_condition VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE logs (    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    medication_id INT REFERENCES medications(medication_id),    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,    event_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE regulations (    regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,    requirement VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,    description TEXT );

CREATE TABLE temperature_logs(
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_id INT,
    logged_date TIMESTAMP,
    temperature_celsius DECIMAL(5,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE medications_conditions(
    medication_id INT,
    condition_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (medication_id, condition_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (condition_id) REFERENCES storage_conditions(condition_id)
);
